game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.description: Embark on a thrilling adventure to find the legendary Lost Artifact that holds unimaginable power.
game.objective: Retrieve the Lost Artifact from the ancient ruins of Zanarkand.

tasks.description: Obtain the map to the ruins
tasks.objective: Find the hidden book that reveals the location of Zanarkand ruins.

tasks.description: Unlock the entrance to the ruins
tasks.objective: Solve the riddles of the ancient guardians to open the gates.
Find your way through the treacherous labyrinth and reach the chamber of the Lost Artifact.

tasks.description: Defeat the Guardian of the Lost Artifact
tasks.objective: Overcome the powerful guardian and retrieve the Lost Artifact.
